text: The Prime Minister of the Hellenic Republic (, Pro̱thypourgós ti̱s Elli̱nikí̱s Di̱mokratías), known as the Prime Minister of Greece (, Pro̱thypourgós ti̱s Elládas), is the head of government of the Hellenic Republic and the leader of the Greek Cabinet. The incumbent Prime Minister is Kyriakos Mitsotakis, who took office on 26 June 2023. ==Living former Prime Ministers== Name Term Date of birth (and age) Kostas Karamanlis 2004–2009 George Papandreou 2009–2011 Lucas Papademos 2011–2012 Panagiotis Pikrammenos 2012 Antonis Samaras 2012–2015 Vassiliki Thanou-Christophilou 2015 Alexis Tsipras 2015–2019 Ioannis Sarmas 2023 ==References== *
title: Prime Minister of Greece
